mapper.sql: id, pname, parentid, grade, media_type, start_time, end_time, description, timelength, orderby, course_id, course_pub_id, status, is_preview, create_date, change_date
mapper.select: select tp.id, tp.pname, tp.parentid, tp.grade, tp.media_type, tp.start_time, tp.end_time, tp.description, tp.timelength, tp.orderby, tp.course_id, tp.course_pub_id, tp.status, tp.is_preview, tp.create_date, tp.change_date, tpm.id tmp_id, tpm.media_id tmp_media_id, tpm.teachplan_id tmp_teachplan_id, tpm.course_id tmp_course_id, tpm.media_fileName tmp_media_fileName, tpm.create_date tmp_create_date, tpm.create_people tmp_create_people, tpm.change_people tmp_change_people from teachplan tp left join teachplan_media tpm on tp.id = tpm.teachplan_id where tp.course_id = #{courseId} order by tp.id
select * from teachplan where parentid = #{parentId} and orderby < #{orderBy} order by orderby desc limit 1
select * from teachplan where parentid = #{parentId} and orderby > #{orderBy} order by orderby asc limit 1
